DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/not applicable indicator regarding information related to the any abnormal condition of the heart or blood vessels that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person being found.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the any abnormal condition of the heart or blood vessels that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person being found.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cardiovascular; pertaining to the heart or blood vessels.:A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to the heart or blood vessels.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have clinica
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have clinically significant cardiovascular disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_TEXT1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have clinically significant cardiovascular abnormalities such as uncontrolled hypertension, congestive heart failure NYHA classification of 3, unstable angina or poorly controlled arrhythmia, or myocardial infarction within 6 months prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRG TEXT 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Presence of symptomatic congestive heart failure, unstable angina or cardiac arrhythmia not controlled by pacer device?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have decompensated congestive heart failure, unstable angina, or uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Presence of uncontrolled  symptomatic congestive heart failure, unstable angina or cardiac arrhythmia not controlled by any device or medication?
